anya-e0901n1:1_0: Pucchā – sādhu sādhu āvuso mayampi dāni tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṁgāyituṁ pubbakiccāni
anya-e0901n1:1_1: samārabhāma…, tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena brahmajālasuttaṁ kattha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0901n1:2: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante rājagahaṁ antarā ca nāḷandaṁ ambalaṭṭhikāyaṁ rājāgārake bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0901n1:4: Vissajjanā – suppiyañca bhante paribbājakaṁ brahmadattañca māṇavaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0901n1:6_0: Vissajjanā – vaṇṇāvaṇṇe bhante, suppiyo hi bhante anekapariyāyena buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ
anya-e0901n1:6_1: bhāsati dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, suppiyassa pana paribbājakassa
anya-e0901n1:6_2: antevāsī brahmadatto māṇavo anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati dhammassa vaṇṇaṁ
anya-e0901n1:6_3: bhāsati saṅghassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0901n1:9: Vissajjanā – tayo bhante tattha anusandhayo, eko avaṇṇānusandhi, dve vaṇṇānusandhiyo.
anya-e0901n1:11: Pucchā – tatthāvuso paṭhame anusandhimhi kathaṁ bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ, taṁ saṁkhepato kathehi.
anya-e0901n1:12: Vissajjanā – paṭhame bhante anusandhimhi avaṇṇe manopadosaṁ nivāretvā, tattha ca ādīnavaṁ dassetvā, tattha paṭipajjitabbākāro bhagavatā bhāsito.
anya-e0901n1:13: Mamaṁ vā bhikkhave pare avaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ, dhammassa vā avaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ, tatra tumhehi na āghāto appaccayo na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaṇīyā…
anya-e0901n1:15_0: Pucchā – sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho bhagavā attanā paramukkaṁ sāgatakhantīguṇasamannāgato
anya-e0901n1:15_1: attano sāvakabhūte amhepi tattha samādāpesi, attanā ca lokadhammesu aniñjanasabhāvo
anya-e0901n1:15_2: amhākampi tathattāya ovādamadāsi, dutiyepanāvuso anusandhimhi kathaṁ bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ,
anya-e0901n1:16_0: Vissajjanā – dutiye pana bhante anusandhimhi vaṇṇe cetaso uppilāvitattaṁ nisedhetvā,
anya-e0901n1:16_1: tattha ca ādīnavaṁ dassetvā, tattha ca paṭipajjanākāraṁ dassetvā, puthujjanassa vaṇṇabhūmibhūtāni
anya-e0901n1:17: Mamaṁ vā bhikkhave pare vaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ, dhammassa vā vaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ, saṅghassa vā vaṇṇaṁ bhāseyyuṁ, tatra tumhehi na ānando na somanassaṁ na cetaso abhiraddhi karaṇīyā –
anya-e0901n1:19_0: Pucchā – sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho bhagavā attanā paramukkaṁsagatasuparisuddhasīlasamannāgato,
anya-e0901n1:19_1: taṁ attano suparisuddhasīlaṁ dassetvā parepi tattha niyojesi, tatiye panāvuso anusandhimhi
anya-e0901n1:19_2: kathaṁ bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ, taṁ saṁkhepato pakāsehi.
anya-e0901n1:20_0: Vissajjanā – tatiye pana bhante anusandhimhi dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo sabbaññuta ñāṇena
anya-e0901n1:20_1: vitthārato vibhajitvā, tāsañca cha phassāyatanapadaṭṭhānabhāvaṁ vibhāvetvā, micchādiṭṭhigatikādhiṭṭhā
anya-e0901n1:20_2: nañca vaṭṭaṁ kathetvā, yuttayogabhikkhuadhiṭṭhānañca vivaṭṭaṁ kathetvā, micchādiṭṭhigatikassa
anya-e0901n1:20_3: desanājālato avimuttabhāvaṁ desanājālato vimuttassa natthikabhāvañca vibhāvetvā,
anya-e0901n1:20_4: attano ca katthaci apariyāpannabhāvaṁ dassetvā, upādisesanibbānadhātuṁ pāpetvā desanā
anya-e0901n1:21: Ucchinnabhāvanettiko bhikkhave tathāgatassa kāyo tiṭṭhati, yāvassa kāyo ṭhassati tāva naṁ dakkhanti devamanussā, kāyassa bhedā uddhaṁ jīvitapariyādānā na naṁ dakkhanti devamanussā.
anya-e0901n1:23_0: Pucchā – sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho bhagavā attanā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo ca cha phassāyatanāni
anya-e0901n1:23_1: ca dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni ca sabbaso parijānitvā tesaṁ parijānanatthāya paresampi
anya-e0901n1:23_2: tathattāya dhammaṁ pakāseti, suttañca nāma āvuso catunnaṁ suttanikkhepānaṁ aññataravaseneva
anya-e0901n1:23_3: nikkhittaṁ, tasmā tesu idaṁ suttaṁ katarena suttanikkhepena bhagavatā nikkhittaṁ.
anya-e0901n1:24: Vissajjanā – catūsu bhante suttanikkhepesu aṭṭhuppattinikkhepana idaṁ suttaṁ nikkhittaṁ.
anya-e0901n1:26: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0901n1:29: Pucchā – atthi nu kho āvuso ettha koci viraddhadosā, yena pacchimā janā micchāatthaṁ gaṇheyyuṁ.
